to.shell_command:
echo 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "Shottr"
        click menu item "Capture Screen" of menu 1 of menu bar 2
    end tell' | osascript

echo 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "Shottr"
        click menu item "Capture Area" of menu 1 of menu bar 2
    end tell' | osascript

echo 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "Shottr"
        click menu item "Scrolling Capture" of menu 1 of menu bar 2
    end tell' | osascript

echo 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "Shottr"
        click menu item "Recongize Text/QR" of menu 1 of menu bar 2
    end tell' | osascript

echo 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "Shottr"
        click menu item "Delayed Screenshot (3S)" of menu "more" of menu item "more" of menu 1 of menu bar 2
    end tell' | osascript

echo 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "Shottr"
        click menu item "Repeat Area Capture" of menu "more" of menu item "more" of menu 1 of menu bar 2
    end tell' | osascript

echo 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "Shottr"
        click menu item "Capture Active Window" of menu "more" of menu item "more" of menu 1 of menu bar 2
    end tell' | osascript

echo 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "Shottr"
        click menu item "Capture Any Window" of menu "more" of menu item "more" of menu 1 of menu bar 2
    end tell' | osascript

echo 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "Shottr"
        click menu item "Scrolling (Up)" of menu "more" of menu item "more" of menu 1 of menu bar 2
    end tell' | osascript
